  2. Artera Presenting Validation Data at 2025 ASCO Annual Meeting Highlighting How Multimodal AI Platform (MMAI) is Advancing Personalized Cancer Care  BioSpace
  3. AI test could help to cut the risk of dying from prostate cancer by half, study suggests  Daily Mail
  4. Give prostate cancer patients drug that halves risk of death, NHS told  The Telegraph
  5. ASCO25: ArteraAI's multimodal AI tool redefines risk stratification in prostate cancer  FirstWord Pharma

item.title: For Some Recent Graduates, the A.I. Job Apocalypse May Already Be Here - The New York Times
item.description:
1. For Some Recent Graduates, the A.I. Job Apocalypse May Already Be Here  The New York Times
  2. Behind the Curtain: Top AI CEO foresees white-collar bloodbath  Axios
  3. Anthropic CEO frets about 20% unemployment from AI, but economists are doubtful  theregister.com
  4. AI Is Upending the Job Market, Even at AI Companies Like Anthropic  Business Insider
  5. Anthropic Researchers Warn Of A 'Pretty Terrible Decade' Where AI Outpaces Robotics And People's Main Benefit Is They're 'Fantastic Robots'  Yahoo Finance
